mapper.insert: insert into ACH_Product (ProductID, ProductName, ProductYear, CorperationUnit, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status) values (#{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corperationunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{performance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ACH_Product set ProductName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProductYear = #{productyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CorperationUnit = #{corperationunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Performance = #{performance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TeamID = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateUserID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ProductID, ProductName, ProductYear, CorperationUnit, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Product where ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ProductID, ProductName, ProductYear, CorperationUnit, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Product
